LanguageData.GU_Car_CompleteCaravanBonus_Description: Bonus to caravan movement speed when every colonist in a caravan is riding a mount
LanguageData.GU_Car_incompleteCaravanBonusCap_Title: Not all colonists riding max bonus
LanguageData.GU_Car_incompleteCaravanBonusCap_Descrip: A per-animal bonus is applied for each colonist riding an animal, up to the maximum configured in this setting. This maximum is achieved when all but one colonists are riding. This bonus is not applied when all colonists are riding.
LanguageData.GU_Car_visitorMountChance_Description: Chance that visiting friendly NPC pawns ride an animal
LanguageData.GU_Car_visitorMountChanceTribal_Descript: Chance that visiting friendly tribal NPC pawns ride an animal
LanguageData.GU_Car_InBiomeWeight_Title: Friendly NPC mount from your biome chance
LanguageData.GU_Car_InBiomeWeight_Description: The chance a mount used by a friendly pawn is one from your biome. Chances are normalized to 100% if the sum is not 100
LanguageData.GU_Car_OutBiomeWeight_Title: Friendly NPC from any biome chance
LanguageData.GU_Car_OutBiomeWeight_Description: The chance a mount used by a friendly NPC pawn is one from any biome. Chances are normalized to 100% if the sum is not 100
LanguageData.GU_Car_NonWildWeight_Description: The chance a mount used by a friendly NPC pawn is one not found in the wild. Chances are normalized to 100% if the sum is not 100
LanguageData.GU_Car_Designator_GU_DropAnimal_NPC_Expa: Place drop off points for NPC mounts. When traders or visitors arrive, they will temporarily leave their mounts at the drop off point closest to the place they gather. Mounts will stay near the drop off point until their rider returns. When a drop off point is designated in a room, this room will function as a stable, keeping the animals inside.
